name: Science themed game user interface
description:
I designed this 2d game interface to accompany the laboratory game pack but I wanted its use to be more diverse than just a laboratory so I named it the science ui pack and I suppose it could be used for more than one style of game theme.

There's a whole bunch of things in this ui pack for crafting your panels and ui layouts. including panel decorations, screen and panel connectors, animated elements and more! check out the contents tab to see what's in the file. As always the formats are vector and high definition png files.
